name: then read bit (datenBereit) from OPC interface
initialization the variable databaseReady to true
In case the database is reday (=true) then
Protocl of data reading from OPC server
info:
### 
Protocol of communications between the OPC server and the OPC lenient application
 
The OPC server provides two variables for the handshake with this client OPC application:
"datenbereit" and "datengelesen", in order to send a set of data (zeile) that will be read by this application
Whenever the OPC server wants to send data (zeile), it set the variable
"datenbereit" to true
this client application read the value of this variable every second
after reading this variable it checks if the database is ready (by checking the value of the
global variable "databaseReday"), we do so because we will soon write into the database, and we want to make sure that
no excel file is being generated right now to keep data consistent.
If we found that database is ready (variable "databaseReday" is true)
Now write check the OPC "datenbereit" (that we read every second) if it is true, if so then:
we set the global "datenBereit" variable to true (that reflect the OPC variable "datenbereit", in this case true)
and then we reset the OPOC "datenbereit"  variable to false, to signal to the OPC server that we are ready to read the data (zeile) from
its interface.
the global variable "datenBereit" will be used in another flow "dashBoradDemo" to fetch data (zeile) from OPC server and write them in database
then we will reset it (set to false) in the flow "dashBoradDemo"  after data has been committed into database.
The second variable of the OPC server "datengelesen" will be set in the flow "dashBoradDemo"  to true once the data (zeile)
has been read from OPC server and stored in DB

name: Reading data (zeile) from teh OPC server process
info:
If the global variable "datenbereit" is true (set in the handshake phase in the flow clear to read data)
then we will fetch the data (zeile) form OPC server and store it in the database ( optionally in a CSV file)
Once the data has been fetched and saved in the database the second variable of the OPC server "datengelesen" will be set to true by this flow, to send the ned of data (zeile) reading phase.
The OPC server once find true in the "datengelesen" variable, it will reset it to false
SO then, the process of reading data (zeile) from OPC server  will end.
If the OPC server wishes to send new data (zeile), it has to signla this by setting OPC variable
"datenbereit" to true
